name: Haircut 3D!
description:
Haircut 3D is a free casual game with a mix of 3D and design!

As a hairstylist, many clients need you, and you have the responsibility to make their wishes come true. Unleash your creativity between original hairstyles and gorgeous colors! You can even see some celebrities in the store.

Be careful, or the customer may not be satisfied. You can use a myriad of tools (scissors, trimmers, saws...). To be the best barber!

Are you ready for the barbershop challenge?

Game features:
1. It's easy, and you can't put it down
Just like a real barbershop, follow the customer's instructions
2. A lot of guests are waiting for you to find them
So many guests, and so much more for you to unlock!
3. Hundreds of original hairstyles
You'll never get material, every hairstyle is unique, and you can also focus on the beard.
4. Stunning hair color
Red, blue, green… Try different colors to match your guest's style!
5. Play whenever and wherever you want!
Enjoy barbershops at home and on the subway!
6. 3D Game experience
3D hairdressing process, provide different game experience!

Have you ever dreamed of running your own barber shop or hair salon?
Then here's a haircut salon for you.
There are a lot of customers in your barbershop, and they all want a stylish haircut.
Only you can take care of their hair and make them look amazing.
Try to match the requested hair/beard shape and become the most famous barber ever!
